rows.label: tlk70000008_02_msg0001
rows.name:
All it takes is a little bit of lamplight
and the street looks a lot more lively.
Perks me up! Gwahaha!

rows.label: tlk70000008_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Chalcedony'll do good work if you give
him a few kind words. He's a man who
knows what he's about. Sort we need!

rows.label: tlk70000008_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Pretty fortunate that a kid like that
winds up here. He's got a real can-do
attitude, and he wants to impress.

rows.label: tlk70000008_02_msg0004
rows.name:
He was right here under my nose too.
Only I couldn't see 'im, cos the bleedin'
lamps weren't working!
